changes.content: WayTab now features a guided setup process to for a hassle free install.

We've redesigned the settings menu (and button). Now, when you click the settings button, you'll see a menu animate open. Simply click on one of the categories and the relevent settings will be presented to you.
When editing your schedule, the blocks of the same period will get a light blue background.
The links settings menu now displays icons next to your links.

changes.header: Change how WayTab Tells You How Long is Left
changes.content: WayTab now includes a setting to change between showing percent elapsed or time left in the current period.

WayTab 2.0 includes a number of small design changes to cards, buttons, and modals. These have all received rounder corners. Cards and modals now have shadows. Modal headers and footers no longer have borders.

changes.header: Weekends No Longer Break the Schedule
changes.content: WayTab used to think weekends were school days. So when you came back on Monday, the selected letter day would be 2 days ahead of what it should've been. We taught WayTab what weeks are, so it no longer does that.
